markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Phalanx Of Phalanges](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2029)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Made up of hundreds of finger and toe bones, a phalanx of phalanges clatters along the ground in an eerily uniform manner.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 17

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Phalanx Of Phalanges](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2029)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 83</row>

**Perception** +5; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 16

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), fatigued, [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 3, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 3, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 3, piercing 3, slashing 3

**Weaknesses**
area damage 3, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 3

**Predetermined Path** A phalanx of phalanges knows a single path on even ground no longer than 100 feet, as determined by its creator. The phalanx of phalanges makes no actions other than moving along this path or making Countless Digits attacks against creatures in its way. If impeded on this path or if it takes damage, the phalanx of phalanges is unbound from its path and is permanently berserk, attacking nearby creatures to the best of its ability. Speed 20 feet

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 

**Countless Digits** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each other creature in the phalanx of phalanges' space takes 1d6 piercing damage (1d6+2 piercing damage if the swarm is berserk) (DC 17 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). On a critical failure, the target is thoroughly pinned by the phalanges, becoming [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) until it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (DC 17) or until any creature uses 2 Interact actions to scrape away the bones pinning them down.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-317" />
name: Phalanx Of Phalanges

If impeded on this path or if it takes damage, the phalanx of phalanges is unbound from its path and is permanently berserk, attacking nearby creatures to the best of its ability.
